title: Greg and Colin's Nashville Season Finale Live Show
description:
ABC's Nashville is wrapping up its first season -- and Greg Miller and the Pride of Long Island Colin Moriarty are obsessed with the drama. So, they're livestreaming a second screen experience for the season finale.

Wednesday, May 22nd, at 9:45 p.m. PT, Greg and Colin are livestreaming their reactions to the hit ABC show and creating one place for every Nashville fan to come and discuss the episode and the season. 

15-minute Pre-Show: 9:45 p.m. PT
Live discussion during commercial breaks: 10-11 p.m. PT
30-minute to an hour Post-show: 11 p.m. to Midnight PT

Catch up on Nashville before the finale: http://itunes.apple.com/us/tv-season/nashville-season-1/id550311456

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Follow Colin on Twitter: http://twitter.com/notaxation
Follow Nashville on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Nashville_ABC

Get the Nashville soundtrack on iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/nashville-cast/id576010239
